verses.name: Romans 6:1
verses.text: What shall we say then? Shall we continue in sin, that grace may abound?

verses.name: Romans 6:2
verses.text: God forbid. How shall we, that are dead to sin, live any longer therein?

verses.name: Romans 6:3
verses.text: Know ye not, that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death?

verses.name: Romans 6:4
verses.text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life.
